snippet: As some 3,600 killings in Northern Ireland recede into history, one question just won't go away: Can there be peace without justice?
lead_paragraph: As some 3,600 killings in Northern Ireland recede into history, one question just won't go away: Can there be peace without justice?

headline.print_headline: Northern Ireland and Its Fragile Peace
headline.main: Northern Ireland and Its Fragile Peace
